Plot: The king is missing. For over a 100 years the human lands have been at war with strange and foul creatures, able to raise the dead. Men and Mage alike are recruited by the mad queen to fight, willingly or not. Now, the enemy is expanding, invading even elf and dwarf territory. But in the old, once most powerful kingdom of Arryn, a young girl has the power of visions. She sets out to bring a strange group of misfits together. Following the vague and mysterious visions they all share, they set out on a mission to retrieve a magical object before it falls into enemy hands. Here they get trapped between the two forces fighting a war. Now the choices they make will change the future for everyone.
